|cpu1chip1 = 2Wire;Medusa;3000-000171-006, eC575563-1; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- CPU1 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = M-System;MD2811-D16-V3Q18; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Unigen;UGSV1286T-75; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Kendin;KS8721B; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:12:88 |oui = 00:12:88

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|defaulip = 172.16.0.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = 2WIREXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = uncommon |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/04/2003 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Malaysia
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Texas Instruments;ACX100; |rad1chip2 = Maxim;MAX2820; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "CHIPBOY-SLI" is silkscreened on the board.
The CPU ([http://happytrees.org/chips?page=manufacturer&manufacturer=2WIRE&family=TriMedia on the CPU Grave Yard]) has a TriMedia core. :Device also has a Silicon Labs Si3101 and HW2000 on board.
The default SSID is '''2WIRE''' followed by the last three digits of the serial number. The default WEP key is printed on the unit under the serial number. The device has no reset button. Resettting the password appears to require 2Wire support to provide a temporary password..
==Links of Interest== [http://support.2wire.com/view/768/1000_User_Guide.pdf User guide]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="board scans"> File:2Wire HomePortal 1000HW board top.jpg|board top File:2Wire HomePortal 1000HW board bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
